hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{1+3}&\blue{=13}\\
\blue{4}&\blue{=13}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $4$ is not the same as $13$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{10-4}&\pink{=5}\\
\pink{6}&\pink{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $6$ is not the same as $5$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{1+2}&\purple{=3}\\
\purple{3}&\purple{=3}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $3$ is the same as $3$.
